extendedInfo.description: The Surfing Cornwall app is the leading information resource for surfing in Cornwall on the Android MarketplaceSurfing Cornwall is a guide to surf beaches in Cornwall, recommending the best beach breaks in Cornwall to surf at, with information on places to park, eat and drink nearby.Surfing Cornwall also provides you with a list of recommended surf shops and surf equipment hire places in Cornwall, surf accommodation in Cornwall including hotels, camping and caravan sites and a pick of the best surf schools in Cornwall.Use your phone or tablet's built in GPS to get navigation information to all of the locations listed in this app, and check the 'surf challenge' indicator on each location ensuring you pick the right spot for you (1=novice, 10=expert). Alternatively just use the app to find the best beaches and seaside towns to explore and relax. Want your business location listed in the app free of charge? Contact look.oo.busy@gmail.com or use the app's built-in 'recommend a location' feature!

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: No information other than a few map pins. Not even worth the space on your phone!
reviews.author: A Google User
